pages.text: The $(item)Mechanical Elytra$() works as an Elytra, but much more advanced.$(br2)While gliding, you can sprint forward to gain a constant $(major)speed boost$() using Zaps.$(br2)Sneaking midair will halt you, floating where you were. This also uses Zaps.
The Mechanical Elytra $(red)is not armor$() and provides no damage reduction. It also does not power Carbon Powerarmor.$(br2)While not flying, the Mechanical Elytra will recharge using solar power.
